column4: so anyone who can help me configure my printer through the network i'm using ubuntu 5.0 , ive tried through the add printer -- then its leading me to a small window where i'm supposed to get the drivers .. of which i can't locate ..??????
you first of all need to upgrade to a more recent version of Ubuntu; that one is no longer supported
sure; go to www.ubuntu.com and download the 32 bit 7.10 (gutsy gibbon) version x86
